get.summary: Get a collection of action plans

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return per page. Defaults to 1000.

put.summary: Update/Replace a complete action plan instance with no merge.
put.operationId: Action Plans - Update an action plan

parameters.name: actionPlan
parameters.description: The instance of the plan to update. The entire plan will be replaced with this version.

post.operationId: Action Plans - Create an action plan

parameters.name: actionPlan
parameters.description: The instance of the plan to create.

patch.summary: Update an action plan instance with merge
patch.operationId: Action Plans - Update an action plan

parameters.name: actionPlan
parameters.description:
The instance of the plan to update. Only the fields present in the passed in model will be updated. All other fields and colelctions
            will be left, as is, unless invalid.

get.summary: Get an instance of a specific action plan

delete.operationId: Action Plans - Delete an action plan

parameters.name: actionPlanId
parameters.description: The instance of the plan to delete.

delete.operationId: Action Plans - Delete an action plan objective

parameters.name: actionPlanId
parameters.description: The instance of the plan that the objective belongs to.

parameters.name: objectiveId
parameters.description: The instance of the objective to delete.

get.summary: Gets adherence information for an action plan.

parameters.name: objectiveId
parameters.description: The objective to filter the report to.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The task to filter the report to.

get.summary: Get a collection of task definitions

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return per page. Defaults to 1000.

put.summary: Put an update for an action plan task

post.summary: Post a new action plan task

patch.summary: Patch an update for an action plan task

post.operationId: Onboarding - Step 1: create an invite code from PII

parameters.name: onboardingRequest
parameters.description: The meta data associated with an onboarding request

nextLink.description: The URI for the next page of data

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: An instance of an action plan associated to a user

id.description: The ID of the plan instance

associatedTasks.description: The Task instances associated with this plan

name.description: The name of the plan, localized

description.description: The description of the plan, localized

imageUrl.description: A URL to an image for the plan. Suggested resolution is 212 x 212

thumbnailImageUrl.description: A URL to a thumbnail image for the plan. Suggested resolution is 212 x 212

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization that manages this plan

organizationName.description: The name of the organization that manages this plan

organizationLogoUrl.description: A URL to the logo of the organization that manages this plan

organizationLongFormImageUrl.description: A URL to a larger image for the organization logo that may include the wordmark

objectives.description: The Collection of objectives for the plan

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description:
An instance of an action a user should complete.
            Adherence to a plan is measured by completion statistics against tasks

id.description: The Id of the task instance

startDate.description: The date that the task was started. Read-only

endDate.description: The date that the task was ended. Read-only

name.description: The friendly name of the task

shortDescription.description: The short description of the task

longDescription.description: The detailed description of the task

imageUrl.description: The image URL of the task. Suggested resolution is 200 x 200

thumbnailImageUrl.description: The thumbnail image URL of the task. Suggested resolution is 90 x 90

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization that owns this task

organizationName.description: The name of the organization that owns this task

taskType.description: The type of the task, used to choose the UI editor for the task

signupName.description: The text shown during task signup.

associatedPlanId.description: The ID of the associated plan. This is not needed when adding a task as part of a new plan

associatedObjectiveIds.description: The list of objective IDs the task is associated with

completionType.description: The Completion Type of the Task

frequencyTaskCompletionMetrics.description: Completion metrics for frequency based tasks

scheduledTaskCompletionMetrics.description: Completion metrics for schedule based tasks

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description:
An objective is a high-level concept of what a user wants to accomplish as part of their enrollment in various action plans
            A user may have more than one objective
            A plan may contribute to more than one objective
            Each objective can have one measurable outcome

id.description: The unique identifier of the instance of the objective

outcomeName.description: Gets or sets the name of the outcome

outcomeType.description: Gets or sets the type of the outcome

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: The tracking policy to apply to the Action Plan Task

isAutoTrackable.description: Gets or sets an indicator as to whether or not the Tracking Policy is AutoTrackable

occurrenceMetrics.description: Gets or sets the Occurrence Metrics for the tracking policy

targetEvents.description: The target events to track against

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: The Completion Metrics for frequency based tasks

windowType.description: The window in which the occurrences must be completed

occurrenceCount.description: The number of times the Task has to be completed

reminderState.description: The reminder state of the task

scheduledDays.description:
The days that this will show for the user
            Expected values: { 'Unknown', 'Everyday', 'Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday' }

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: The Completion Metrics for scheduled tasks

scheduledTime.description: The time at which this task is scheduled

reminderState.description: The reminder state of the task

scheduledDays.description:
The days that this will show for the user
            Expected values: { 'Unknown', 'Everyday', 'Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday' }

evaluateTargets.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to evaluate the targets

targets.description: Gets or sets the targets to evaluate

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: The tracking properties of a HealthVault event

elementXPath.description: XML XPath to the property for which task should be tracked

elementValues.description: List of all of the possible values for a given xPath property. (i.e. "run", "running", "walk" etc).

isNegated.description: Flag to indicate if the condition mentioned above is negated. e.g. Item shouldn't be a run or a walk.

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ti.description: Represents a time without a date

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: Defines the Action Plan Range Numeric

propertyName.description: Gets or sets the property name the metric applies to

valueType.description: Gets or sets the Value Type of the Metric

maxTarget.description: Gets or sets the Max value of the target

minTarget.description: Gets or sets the min value of the target

propertyXPath.description: Gets or sets the XPath of the property that the metric applies to

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V1.He.description:
Distribution of Heart Rates through a range of values defined by Fitness experts 
            which determine the effectiveness of the exercise

underHealthyHeart.description: The number of minutes where the HR was below 50% of the user's max HR

underAerobic.description:
Note: this field is deprecated. The correct field name is now UnderHealthyHeart. Populated for backwards compatibility until V2
            The number of minutes where the HR was below 50% of the user's max HR

aerobic.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 70-80% of the user's max HR

anaerobic.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 80-90% of the user's max HR

fitnessZone.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 60-70% of the user's max HR

healthyHeart.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 50-60% of the user's max HR

redline.description: The number of minutes where the HR was between 90-100% of the user's max HR

overRedline.description: The number of minutes above the user's max HR

speedOverGround.description: The speed over ground for the GPS point in m/s * 100

latitude.description: The latitude for the GPS point in degrees * 10^7 (+ = North)

longitude.description: The longitude for the GPS point in degrees * 10^7 (+ = East)

elevationFromMeanSeaLevel.description: The elevation from mean sea level in m * 100

estimatedHorizontalError.description: The estimated horizontal error in m * 100

estimatedVerticalError.description: The estimated vertical error in m * 100

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: An action plan being created for a user

name.description: The name of the plan, localized

description.description: The description of the plan, localized

imageUrl.description: A URL to an image for the plan. Suggested resolution is 212 x 212

thumbnailImageUrl.description: A URL to a thumbnail image for the plan. Suggested resolution is 212 x 212

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization that manages this plan

organizationName.description: The name of the organization that manages this plan

organizationLogoUrl.description: A URL to the logo of the organization that manages this plan

organizationLongFormImageUrl.description: A URL to a larger image for the organization logo that may include the wordmark

objectives.description: The Collection of objectives for the plan

associatedTasks.description: The Tasks associated with this plan

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description:
An action a user should complete.
            Adherence to a plan is measured by completion statistics against tasks

name.description: The friendly name of the task

shortDescription.description: The short description of the task

longDescription.description: The detailed description of the task

imageUrl.description: The image URL of the task. Suggested resolution is 200 x 200

thumbnailImageUrl.description: The thumbnail image URL of the task. Suggested resolution is 90 x 90

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization that owns this task

organizationName.description: The name of the organization that owns this task

taskType.description: The type of the task, used to choose the UI editor for the task

signupName.description: The text shown during task signup.

associatedPlanId.description: The ID of the associated plan. This is not needed when adding a task as part of a new plan

associatedObjectiveIds.description: The list of objective IDs the task is associated with

completionType.description: The Completion Type of the Task

frequencyTaskCompletionMetrics.description: Completion metrics for frequency based tasks

scheduledTaskCompletionMetrics.description: Completion metrics for schedule based tasks

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: An action plan for adherence reporting purposes

startDate.description: The starting date of the adherence summary.

endDate.description: The ending date of the adherence summary.

objectives.description: The Collection of objectives for the plan

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: An action plan objective for the purpose of the adherence report

id.description: The unique identifier of the instance of the objective

outcomeName.description: The name of the associated outcome

associatedTasks.description: The Tasks associated with this plan

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: An adherence summary for a task in an action plan

windowType.description: The recurrence type of the schedule window

startDate.description: The starting date of the task or the start date requested, whichever is later.

endDate.description: The ending date of the task or the end date requested, whichever is earlier.

weeklyAdherence.description: A list of weekly adherence summaries

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Ac.description: A summary of a tasks weekly adherence

completions.description: The # of completions that occurred this week

intendedCompletions.description: The # of completions that were intended for this week

intendedOccurrences.description: The # of occurrences that were intended for this week

manualTrackedOccurrences.description: The # of occurrences that were manually tracked this week

automaticTrackedOccurrences.description: The # of occurrences that were automatically tracked this week

automaticTrackedOccurrenceEvidence.description: A list of evidence (HealthVault Thing IDs) that were automatically tracked

Microsoft.Health.Platform.Entities.V3.Re.description: The action plans task collection response

nextLink.description: The URI for the next page of data

secretQuestion.description: Gets or sets the user's secret question

secretAnswer.description: Gets or sets the user's secret answer

firstName.description: Gets or sets the user's first name.

lastName.description: Gets or sets the user's last name.

email.description: Gets or sets the user's email address

zipCode.description: Gets and sets the user zip code/postal code

state.description: Gets and sets the user's state

country.description: Gets and sets the user's country/region

birthday.description: Gets and sets the user's birthday

gender.description: Gets and sets the user gender

weight.description: Gets and sets the user's weight

height.description: Gets and sets the user's Height

actionPlanTemplateIds.description:
Gets or sets the list of action plan template ids to which the user

conditions.description: Gets or sets the list of health conditions that will be displayed to the user during consent collection

invitationCode.description: Gets or sets the invitation code.

inviteUrl.description: Get Or Set the invite url

retriesRemaining.description: Gets or sets the retries remaining.
